fields.name: icon
fields.desc: An optional icon to display at the top of the dialog.

fields.name: iconColor
fields.desc: Color for the [Icon] in the [icon] of this [AlertDialog].

fields.name: iconPadding
fields.desc: Padding around the [icon].

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The (optional) title of the dialog is displayed in a large font at the top of the dialog, below the (optional) [icon].

fields.name: titlePadding
fields.desc: Padding around the title.

fields.name: titleTextStyle
fields.desc: Style for the text in the [title] of this [AlertDialog].

fields.name: content
fields.desc: The (optional) content of the dialog is displayed in the center of the dialog in a lighter font.

fields.name: contentPadding
fields.desc: Padding around the content.

fields.name: contentTextStyle
fields.desc: Style for the text in the [content] of this [AlertDialog].

fields.name: actions
fields.desc: The (optional) set of actions that are displayed at the bottom of the dialog with an [OverflowBar].

fields.name: actionsPadding
fields.desc: Padding around the set of [actions] at the bottom of the dialog.

fields.name: actionsAlignment
fields.desc: Defines the horizontal layout of the [actions] according to the same rules as for [Row.mainAxisAlignment].

fields.name: actionsOverflowAlignment
fields.desc: The horizontal alignment of [actions] within the vertical "overflow" layout.

fields.name: actionsOverflowDirection
fields.desc: The vertical direction of [actions] if the children overflow horizontally.

fields.name: actionsOverflowButtonSpacing
fields.desc: The spacing between [actions] when the [OverflowBar] switches to a column layout because the actions don't fit horizontally.

fields.name: buttonPadding
fields.desc: The padding that surrounds each button in [actions].

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dialog.backgroundColor}

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dialog.elevation}

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dialog.shadowColor}

fields.name: surfaceTintColor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dialog.surfaceTintColor}

fields.name: semanticLabel
fields.desc: The semantic label of the dialog used by accessibility frameworks to announce screen transitions when the dialog is opened and closed.

fields.name: insetPadding
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dialog.insetPadding}

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dialog.clipBehavior}

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dialog.shape}

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.dialog.alignment}

fields.name: scrollable
fields.desc: Determines whether the [title] and [content] widgets are wrapped in a scrollable.
